parsedResult.explanation: Transformed the template to a dark theme. This involved updating `styleVariables` to use dark background and text colors, and adjusting primary/secondary/accent colors to complement the dark aesthetic. Tailwind classes were modified to reflect the dark theme, such as changing background colors and text colors of elements like the main image container, headings, and buttons. Feature list borders were also adjusted to fit the new color scheme. The overall effect is a sophisticated and modern dark mode experience.
